title: Butternut squash and blue cheese bake
ingredients: ['1 (1.8kg) butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cubed', '1/3 onion, finely chopped', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '55g dried Italian breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh thyme', '175g blue cheese, crumbled', 'sea salt and ground black pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons dried Italian breadcrumbs']
